dcterms:description: The Stanford Sentiment Treebank (SST) is a dataset used for sentiment classification, where each constituent node in a phrase-structured tree is manually assigned an integer sentiment polarity from 0 to 4, corresponding to five sentiment classes.
dcterms:title: Stanford Sentiment TreeBank (SST)
